message: Bob, I'm confident this product will be a valuable asset for you, considering its worth of $1,200,000 to you. I'm offering it to you for $1,100,000. This represents a significant opportunity for both of us.  Let me know your thoughts.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to pay closer to my own valuation.  I'd be willing to offer $1,050,000 for the product.  This still represents a significant profit for you and a good deal for me.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I need to be closer to my valuation to make this work.  I'm willing to come down to $1,075,000. This still represents a good deal for you, considering the value you've placed on the product. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
